The Lord loves you, the Lord upholds you. In God you can triumph. I have appreciated the confidence you have ever maintained in my humble self, as the Lord's servant, who speaks and works His will. You have ever shown me respect. In return you have my sincere appreciation of the same.--Letter 73, 1899, pp. 5,6,8. (To J. H. Kellogg, April 17, 1899.)
